articles.title: Delhivery announces drone research plan as revenue grows, loss narrows in Q4 | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Before announcing its Q4 results, the company said it has incorporated a wholly owned subsidiary, Delhivery Robotics Pvt Ltd, to conduct research and development in drone technology and manufacturing.
